title: WavePad 16.33 – Create and edit audio recordings
content: WavePad is a full-featured professional sound editor. It lets you make and edit music, voice and other audio recordings. When editing audio files you can cut, copy and paste parts of recordings and, if required, add effects like echo, amplification and noise reduction. title: Cookie 6.6.8 – Protect your online privacy
